title: Advertising tries to create inelastic demand

content.question: In monopolistic competition, a goal of advertising is to

choices.label: reduce a firm’s short-run average total cost
minimize a firm’s long-run average total cost
make a firm’s demand curve more elastic
make a firm’s demand curve less elastic
shift a firm’s demand curve to the left

content.answer: make a firm’s demand curve less elastic

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
